ygData.subject: Re: Diamond Dust possible location...
ygData.msgSnippet: Yah, 6/20, +3 STR/DEX/AGI I believe. Usuable by ONLY small races, GNM,DWF,HAF, I forget what classes tho. But I remember I wanted one for my halfling cleric at
ygData.messageBody:
Yah, 6/20, +3 STR/DEX/AGI I believe. Usuable by ONLY small races,
GNM,DWF,HAF, I forget what classes tho. But I remember I wanted one for my
halfling cleric at one time... so I'm sure Its prolly WAR/PAL/CLR ?? not
sure on others...

>6 20!?!?! those are GOOOOOD stats, sounds to good to be true actually, can
>someone verify this???

Yes, it's 6/20, not magic, some minor stat boosts, and only useable by dwarf
or gnome clerics and paladins, maybe one other race. There are times when
you want to hit magic however.
<< text3.html >>
